703000f-a.text:
transcription: Ashland Place, east side, between Willoughby Street and De Kalb Ave., showing Raymond Street City Prison. 1923.

Comments: I recall walking north by the still operational jail during the period 1958-1962 when I attended Brooklyn Technical High School nearby (DeKalb and Ft. Greene Pl.).  The jail was demolished in 1963.
703000f-a.folder: Ashland Place & Willoughby Street, Brooklyn, NY

703002f-a.text:
Ashland Place, west side, from and including Willoughby, to, but not including Bolivar Streets.
October 31, 1927.

P.L. Sperr
703002f-a.folder: Ashland Place & Willoughby Street, Brooklyn, NY
